answers.answer: Hi thereI am 5 weeks pregnant and also on Cyclogest. I also had a miscarriage on 31 August.I also suffer from polycyctic ovaries and type 2 diabetes so I am also on metformin as well as baby aspirin 81 mg daily.A friend of mine had 4 miscarriages and delivered a bouncy healthy boy with the aid of Cyclogest.Congratulations, you will have a baby. Since they have seen the baby's heartbeat the chances of a miscarriage are very low.Enjoy every minute of it.I will have my scan next week and yes, I am nervous!

question: i had a miscarriage in feb this year, im now 6 weeks pregant!  Went for 1st scan today, saw the heartbeat, im so happy!  Doctor said i must stay another 6 weeks on Cyclogest.  Has anyone been on it and how successful is it?
title: Cyclogest
